Name: Post Cards
About the game: A collection of three small games. Explore three card-sized games. Each one - ocean, desert and grove - comes with its own goals and game mechanics. See if you can complete all of them, or simply enjoy these interactive paintings. Features 3 games in one painting-like design 15 minutes of gameplay Sokpop makes a new game every month!
